item.title: How to create blog on github.io with Hugo
item.description: Introduction In this tutorial you will learn how to create personal website on github.io domain using Hugo. Hugo is a static site generator written in Go. It allows users to create websites quickly and easily. Hugo takes a directory with content and templates and renders them into a full HTML website. It is often used for creating blogs, documentation, and other types of static websites. For simple blogging website you only need to write content in .
